text: May 22, 2018 / 5:18 PM / Updated an hour ago IPL Scoreboard May 22 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of qualifier 1 between Sunrisers Hyderabad and Chennai Super Kings on Tuesday at Mumbai, India Chennai Super Kings win by 2 wickets Sunrisers Hyderabad 1st innings Shikhar Dhawan b Deepak Chahar 0 Shreevats Goswami c&b Lungi Ngidi 12 Kane Williamson c MS Dhoni b Shardul Thakur 24 Manish Pandey c&b Ravindra Jadeja 8 Shakib Al Hasan c MS Dhoni b Dwayne Bravo 12 Yusuf Pathan c&b Dwayne Bravo 24 Carlos Brathwaite Not Out 43 Bhuvneshwar Kumar Run Out MS Dhoni 7 Extras 0b 0lb 0nb 0pen 9w 9 Total (20.0 overs) 139-7 Fall of Wickets : 1-0 Dhawan, 2-34 Goswami, 3-36 Williamson, 4-50 Al Hasan, 5-69 Pandey, 6-88 Pathan, 7-139 Kumar Did Not Bat : Khan, Kaul, Sharma Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Deepak Chahar 4 0 31 1 7.75 2w Lungi Ngidi 4 0 20 1 5.00 Shardul Thakur 4 0 50 1 12.50 3w Dwayne Bravo 4 0 25 2 6.25 4w Ravindra Jadeja 4 0 13 1 3.25 Chennai Super Kings 1st innings Shane Watson c Shreevats Goswami b Bhuvneshwar Kumar 0 Faf du Plessis Not Out 67 Suresh Raina b Siddarth Kaul 22 Ambati Rayudu b Siddarth Kaul 0 MS Dhoni b Rashid Khan 9 Dwayne Bravo c Shikhar Dhawan b Rashid Khan 7 Ravindra Jadeja c&b Sandeep Sharma 3 Deepak Chahar c Carlos Brathwaite b Sandeep Sharma 10 Harbhajan Singh Run Out Rashid Khan 2 Shardul Thakur Not Out 15 Extras 0b 2lb 0nb 0pen 3w 5 Total (19.1 overs) 140-8 Fall of Wickets : 1-0 Watson, 2-24 Raina, 3-24 Rayudu, 4-39 Dhoni, 5-57 Bravo, 6-62 Jadeja, 7-92 Chahar, 8-113 Singh Did Not Bat : Ngidi Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Bhuvneshwar Kumar 3.1 0 14 1 4.42 1w Sandeep Sharma 3 0 30 2 10.00 Siddarth Kaul 4 0 32 2 8.00 1w Carlos Brathwaite 3 0 31 0 10.33 1w Rashid Khan 4 0 11 2 2.75 Shakib Al Hasan 2 0 20 0 10.00 Umpire Marais Erasmus Umpire Chettithody Shamsuddin Video Sundaram Ravi Match Referee Andrew Pycroft
